Package cs350s22.component.sensor.watchdog

Class WatchdogHigh

java.lang.Object
cs350s22.component.sensor.watchdog.A_Watchdog
cs350s22.component.sensor.watchdog.A_WatchdogSingle
cs350s22.component.sensor.watchdog.WatchdogHigh
public class WatchdogHigh extends A_WatchdogSingle
Defines a watchdog that monitors a value and reports whenever it is outside the upper limit exclusively.
